title: Difference in empirical and normative statements

content.question: Statement X: The rate of population growth has decreased in Iran since the 1990s.Statement Y: Developing countries should adopt population growth policies similar to Iran’s. Identify the empirical statement above. Identify the normative statement above. Explain the difference between a normative and an empirical statement.

frqParts.text: Statement X: The rate of population growth has decreased in Iran since the 1990s.Statement Y: Developing countries should adopt population growth policies similar to Iran’s. Identify the empirical statement above. Identify the normative statement above. Explain the difference between a normative and an empirical statement.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
